Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

char *

The basic type char * describes a normal zero-terminated C-style string.


Group: Basic Types
Related Functions: AIL_enumerate_3D_providers, AIL_enumerate_filters, AIL_last_error, AIL_list_DLS, AIL_list_MIDI, AIL_set_redist_directory
